content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the jug. From there, throw a left heel up, reach a left hand crimp, reach a right hand sidepull on the arete, bump the left hand up again, reach a good left hand, and top it out.
content.protection: A pair of pads should work well. The landing has a few rocks around the fall zone, but it pads up nicely.
content.location: It climbs the north side of the northwest arete.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand edge below the lip and a right hand crimp on the slab. From there, move to a left hand sloper edge, match with the right hand, continue along the lip through a pair of decent features, reach the jug at the apex, throw a heel over, and top it out.
content.protection: A pad or two will work well. The landing is very good.
content.location: It climbs the southwest lip of Vector Victor.

content.description: Sit start with hands matched on the large shelf. From there, make a big move out right to the lip, bring the feet over, follow with a big left hand to the lip, match, throw a heel over, and top it out.
content.protection: A pad will work well. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It climbs the west facing overhang of Vector Victor.
